name: Car accident
description: A traffic incident resulting in damage or injury.

name: Human trafficking for prostitution
description: The illegal trade of humans for exploitation, particularly in the sex industry.

name: Murder
description: The unlawful killing of another person with intent.

name: Suspect
description: An individual suspected of being involved in a crime or incident.

name: Terrorist
description: An individual involved in acts of terror, often targeting civilians.

name: Terrorist attack
description: An act of violence aimed at causing terror, usually targeting civilians or symbols of power.

name: Burglary
description: Illegal entry into a building with intent to commit a crime.

name: Fraud
description: Wrongful or criminal deception intended to result in financial or personal gain.

name: Cybercrime
description: Criminal activities carried out by means of computers or the internet.

name: Arson
description: The criminal act of deliberately setting fire to property.

name: Domestic violence
description: Abuse or violence within a domestic setting.

name: Embezzlement
description: Theft or misappropriation of funds placed in one's trust.

name: Kidnapping
description: The unlawful act of taking someone away by force.

name: Drug trafficking
description: Illegal production, distribution, or sale of drugs.

name: Money laundering
description: The process of concealing the origins of illegally obtained money.

name: Assault
description: A physical attack on another person.

name: Vandalism
description: Deliberate destruction or damage to property.

name: Theft
description: The act of stealing someone else's property.

name: Forgery
description: The act of creating a false document with the intent to deceive.

name: Robbery
description: The act of taking property unlawfully from a person by force.
